gui.casting.buttons.cycle_valid_alloy: Фильтр: %s, Нажмите для автоматической выплавки, Найдено %s сплавов
gui.casting.buttons.fluid: Фильтр: Пустой, Нажмите для автоматической выплавки
gui.casting.buttons.no_alloy: Фильтр: Пустой, Нажмите для автоматической выплавки
gui.casting.buttons.no_fuel: Не найдено топливо в резервуаре плавильной печи!
gui.casting.buttons.not_enough_fluid: Недостаточно жидкости в резервуаре плавильной печи!
gui.casting.buttons.not_hot_enough: Топливо недостаточно горячее для плавления этого предмета!
gui.casting.buttons.regulator_count: Разделение резервуара плавильной печи: %smb для %s жидкостей
gui.casting.buttons.wrong_fluid: Неправильная жидкость в резервуаре плавильной печи!
gui.casting.jei.information.controller:
The Controller can be used to melt items into their molten variants! 

This needs a Fuel Tank to work. The Fuel Tank must contain a Fuel that is hot enough to melt the item, Hotter fluids melt faster

Holding Shift whilst above a certain tank and left clicking will remove the fluid from the that tank!

Stores fluids when broken!
gui.casting.jei.information.equipment_mo:
Used to apply modifiers to your equipment!, Your first modifier will add Level 1 to your equipment additional modifiers require an additional level. Use your tools to Level Up and get more modifier slots.

Using a Repairing Mold will allow you to repair Equipment using its molten variants! 

Search Equipment Modifiers in JEI to view the modifiers!

Place the right items and or fluids in the Equipment Modifier then add a valid piece of Equipment to add that effect!

Holding Shift whilst above the tank and left clicking will remove the fluid from the tank!

Stores fluids when broken!
gui.casting.jei.information.fluid_mover:
Used to move fluids between tanks, Holds up to 8000mb of a single fluid. 

Click on a tank to collect fluid and click on another tank to add!

Will try to fill the selected tank before collecting fluids!
gui.casting.jei.information.mixer:
The Mixer can be used to mix molten fluids together! 

Holding Shift whilst above a certain tank and left clicking will remove the fluid from the that tank!

Stores fluids when broken!
gui.casting.jei.information.mixer_whisk:
Used to speed up the mixer when placed above it. 

For each whisk above the mixer the tick rate is decreased by 40 ticks!

Additional whisks placed after the tick rate is at its lowest (20) will have no effect!
gui.casting.jei.information.solidifier:
The Solidifier is used to turn your molten resource into useful item! 

This can use an optional Fuel Tank adjacent to it, cooler fluids (below 1000) in the tank will make the Solidifier faster

Fluid can be locked to prevent another fluids from going in, click the lock button next to the fluid tank.

Holding Shift whilst above the tank and left clicking will remove the fluid from the tank!

Stores fluids when broken!
gui.casting.jei.information.tank:
The Tank stores the fuel used in the Controller to melt items!

Can also be used with the Solidifier colder fluids in the tank makes the Solidifier faster 

Stores fluids when broken!
